title: Energy| Reliance Industries Limited
description: RIL envisions making India energy sufficient. This vision led to setting up the world’s largest integrated refinery complex at a single-site in Jamnagar. Our commitment is a clean and sustainable future by 2035.
keywords: energy, reliance, oil & gas exploration, oil & gas production
og:title: Reliance Industries Limited – Retail Markets | Telecom | Petroleum Refining & Marketing | Petrochemicals | Hydrocarbon Exploration & Production | Jio 4G | Reliance Shares
og:description: Reliance Industries Limited is committed to innovation-led, exponential growth in the areas of hydrocarbon exploration and production, petroleum refining and marketing, petrochemicals, retail and telecommunications.
